item.title: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (4.0.6-202009121407) -- Point Release -- Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Testers wanted!

Whonix – 13 Sep 20

HowTo: Install the Testers-Only Version of Qubes-Whonix ™

HowTo: Install the Testers-Only Version of Qubes-Whonix ™

Or.

Whonix – 21 Mar 20

Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ TemplateVMs - Testers-Only Version

How to Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ TemplateVMs - Testers-Only Version

Changes:

Contains all enhancements there were recently released.

Whonix / Kicksecure 15.0.1.4.8 - for VirtualBox - Point Release! News
This is a point release . Download Whonix for VirtualBox: Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible. This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix! Please Donate! Please Contribute! Notable Changes Whonix: Thunderbird protocol level leak prevention. Replacement for what previously was done by torbirdy. See torbirdy deprecated - replacement required. Ported from Tails to anon-apps-config. Credits: Thanks to Tails for the torbird…

Let’s test these templates!

  • https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2026
  • https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2027

Alternatively:

In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix testers repository.

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (4.0.6-202009121407) -- Point Release -- Testers Wanted!
